resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

paddyhoran commented on a change in pull request #3033: ARROW-3880: [Rust] Implement simple math operations for numeric arrays
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3033#discussion_r236918426
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/src/array.rs
 ##########
 @@ -210,6 +210,48 @@ macro_rules! def_primitive_array {
                 n
             }
 
+            pub fn add(&self, other: &PrimitiveArray<$native_ty>) -> PrimitiveArray<$native_ty> {
+                self.math_helper(other, |a, b| a + b)
+            }
+
+            pub fn subtract(
+                &self,
+                other: &PrimitiveArray<$native_ty>,
+            ) -> PrimitiveArray<$native_ty> {
+                self.math_helper(other, |a, b| a - b)
+            }
+
+            pub fn multiply(
+                &self,
+                other: &PrimitiveArray<$native_ty>,
+            ) -> PrimitiveArray<$native_ty> {
+                self.math_helper(other, |a, b| a * b)
+            }
+
+            pub fn divide(&self, other: &PrimitiveArray<$native_ty>) -> PrimitiveArray<$native_ty> {
+                self.math_helper(other, |a, b| a / b)
 
 Review comment:
   We could use something like [this](https://rust-num.github.io/num/num/trait.Zero.html).
   
   In [ARROW-3878](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3031) @sunchao is introducing the following:
   `pub trait ArrowNumericType: ArrowPrimitiveType {}`
   
   We could make this:
   `pub trait ArrowNumericType: ArrowPrimitiveType + Zero {}` and you could make the above generic over `ArrowNumericType`.
   
   I think it's fine to merge as is and open a JIRA for the follow up work, as once ARROW-3878 is merged the solution will change.

----------------------------------------------------------------

fields.description: Given two primitive arrays of numeric types, it should be possible to perform simple math operations such as add, subtract, multiply, divide.
fields.summary: [Rust] PrimitiveArray<T> should support simple math operations
